DOC.detailed_description: Blood sample collect day final oocyte maturation , serum Progesterone level measure use chemiluminescent immunoassay quantitative determination hormone . The P/F ratio calculate accord equation ( P ( ng/mL ) /number follicle ) define measurement obtain day final oocyte maturation . All ultrasound perform In vitro fertilization center , include number follicle â‰¥14mm day final oocyte maturation ratio calculation Oocytes retrieve 36 hour injection subsequently fertilize In vitro fertilization Intra cytoplasmic sperm injection . On day 2 - 5 , embryos evaluate cell number morphology . Each embryo transfer evaluate blastomere size fragmentation . Embryos grade follow . Those equal blastomere size fragmentation consider Grade 1 ; blastomere equal size slight fragmentation ( < 20 % ) Grade 2 ; blastomere unequal size fragmentation Grade 3 ; blastomere equal unequal size moderate fragmentation ( 20 % -50 % ) Grade 4 ; unrecognizable blastomere severe fragmentation ( > 50 % ) Grade 5 . The embryo transfer postretrieval day ( 2 - 5 ) . Pregnancy define Human chorionic gonadotropin titer within 11 day follow Embryo transfer . Clinical pregnancy define observation intrauterine embryo heart motion 7 week gestation .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Women type subfertility undergo IVF treatment . 2 . Age ( 2040 ) year old 3 . Body mass index ( 2040 ) 4 . Selected embryo grade 1 2 quality . 1 . Age 40 year old 2 . BMI 40 3 . Bad quality embryo 4 . Uterine anomaly malformation affect embryo transfer .
